column1: He's right, Plex. We're getting older. I don't wanna do the little kid thing the rest of my life.
It's time for us to start playing to older people. Maybe we need to be edgier. Have a little sex appeal.
I'm an artist. And if all I ever do is play to kids, then I'll be a joke.  I have to move on.
I'm done being a kiddie star!
Thanks. Oh my, here we go!
Come on, come on, and pound my strange. Pound it like this,  pound it like that.
